revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = TG3452.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway |caption2 = DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0 |pp = https://www.arris.com/products/touchstone-tg3452-cable-voice-gateway/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Arris_TG3452 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Arris |model = TG3452 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC22002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UIDTG3452 |icid = 6670A-TG3452 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = ARCT04789 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;FHCE2752M;Puma 7, FHCE2752M, (SR31B); |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 2.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F4G08ABAEAWP-IT; |flash1size = 512<!-- 500MB --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TC2G63GFR-RDA; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Intel;PEB7085M<!-- (SLLMJ) -->; |cm_down_c = 32 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.0 |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.1 (Gen1) |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.1, MoCA 2.0, Wave2, MU-MIMO, battery backup, analog phone port, fan, |addchip = 5GHz Front End Module (FEM);Skyworks;SKY85720-11;SKY, 720, 20001;4; ,,, DOCSIS 3.1 Cable Receiver (Tuner);MaxLinear;MXL278;;1; ,,, DOCSIS 3.1 Upstream Amplifier;MaxLinear;MXL236;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = ARRIS - XXXX, ARRIS - XXXX-5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/01/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Celeno;CL2440; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Celeno;CL2432; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{FCC ST|11/28/2017|indexme.}} 2x192 MHz OFDM in the downstream and 2x96MHz OFDMA :in the upstream along with 32x8 channel bonding
{{see also|Arris TG3442|Arris MG2402G/CT|Arris TG1672G}}
"Multi Processor Technology with ARM and ATOM based Application Processor" :CPU: [[Intel Puma]] 7 - FHCE2752M (SR31B) @2.5GHz Dual Core :WLAN: [[Celeno]] CL2440 (4T4R AC) + [[Celeno]] CL2432 (3T3R N)
==Links of Interest== [https://www.arris.com/globalassets/resources/data-sheets/touchstone-tg3452-data-sheet.pdf Datasheet]
===News=== *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/arris-touchstone-tg3452-docsis-31-voip-gateway-3942 On '''SpeedGuide'''] *[http://www.multichannel.com/news/distribution/arris-expands-docsis-31-gigabit-gateway-family/407937 On '''MultiChannel'''] *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r31122204-SB6190-Puma6-TCP-UDP-Network-Latency-Issue-Discussion~start=7619 On '''DSLReports''' forums] ([http://www.dslreports.com/speak/slideshow/31707697?c=2339160&dsz=o tables])
==See also== :;[[List of DOCSIS Cable Modems]] • [http://www.arris.com/products/docsis-3.1-broadband-devices/ DOCSIS 3.1 Broadband Devices] *[[Arris TG3442]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi *[[Arris TG3452]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0 *[[Arris TG3462]] - ''Touchstone Cable Voice Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 8x8 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Zigbee & BT *[[Arris TG3482ER]] - ''Touchstone Wireless Telephony Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 8x8 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Zigbee & BT<!-- Same specs, may be the same device --> *[[Arris DG3450]] - ''Touchstone Cable Gateway'' :DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0
